short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and auto-apply custom speeds for different YouTube channels. Customize preset speeds via the controller.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Channel-Based Speed Settings
· Save and auto-apply custom playback speeds for individual YouTube channels
· Seamlessly switches speeds when changing between channels. Perfect for YouTubers with different speaking styles and speed

🎮 Flexible Speed Controls
· Customizable quick-switch speed presets
· Adjustable speed step value for fine-tuning
· Configurable controller position on video player
· Optional global speed memory
